mapper.insert: insert into t_funds_withdraw(user_id, withdraw_no, amount, bankcard_id, withdraw_status) select #{userId}, #{withdrawNo}, #{amount}, #{bankcardId}, 0 from dual where exists( select t_user_wallet.usable_rmb_balance as usableRmbBalance, (select ifnull(sum(t_funds_withdraw.amount), 0) from t_funds_withdraw where t_funds_withdraw.user_id = #{userId} and t_funds_withdraw.complete_time is null) as withdrawAmount from t_user_wallet where t_user_wallet.id = #{userId} having usableRmbBalance - withdrawAmount >= #{amount})

withdraw_status = #{withdrawStatus},
withdraw_description = #{description},
